belongs_to_collection.name: The Urban Crisis and the New Militants

original_title: The Urban Crisis and the New Militants: Module 4 - The People’s Right to Know: Police vs. Reporters
overview: The People’s Right to Know: Police vs. Reporters interviews photojournalist Paul Sequeira on his experience covering the 1968 Convention and the police attempts to physically restrict reporters’ access.
title: The Urban Crisis and the New Militants: Module 4 - The People’s Right to Know: Police vs. Reporters
